**User:**
I've been hearing about some updates to the Verus network, and I'm a bit concerned. What happens if a notary, pool, or exchange fails to upgrade to version v0.7.3-6 before notary changes take effect on block 1562500?

**AI Assistant:**
Don't worry, it's not the end of the world if a notary, pool, or exchange fails to upgrade to version v0.7.3-6 before the notary changes take effect on block 1562500. Failing to update to version v0.7.3-6 will not prevent connection to the network. However, updating in a timely manner will ensure a stronger, notarized connection to the Verus blockchain. So, it's still important to upgrade as soon as possible to take advantage of the new features and security enhancements.
